name: Huawei | VRP | Network | Link | Link Up #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %%01IFNET/4/IF_STATE(l)[1479]:Interface GigabitEthernet2/0/9 has turned into UP state.

patterns.value_re: Interface (?P<interface>\S+)( has)? turned into UP state\.

name: Huawei | VRP | Network | Link | Link Up #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %%01IFNET/4/UPDOWN(l): The state of interface Ethernet0/0/16 was changed to UP.

patterns.value_re: The state of interface (?P<interface>\S+) was changed UP\.

name: Huawei | VRP | Network | Link | Link Down #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %%01IFNET/4/IF_STATE(l)[1475]:Interface GigabitEthernet2/0/9 has turned into DOWN state.

patterns.value_re: Interface (?P<interface>\S+)( has)? turned into DOWN state\.

name: Huawei | VRP | Network | Link | Link Down #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %%01IFNET/4/UPDOWN(l): The state of interface Ethernet0/0/16 was changed to DOWN.

patterns.value_re: The state of interface (?P<interface>\S+) was changed to DOWN.

name: Huawei | VRP | Network | Link | Link Up (SNMP)
description:
IF-MIB::linkUp 
%%01IFNET/4/IF_STATE(l)[0]:Interface Ethernet0/0/4 has turned into UP state.
